problem_text_cn: 如图,在矩形ABCD中,AB=3,BC=5,点E在对角线AC上,连接BE,作EF⊥BE,垂足为E,直线EF交线段DC于点F,则\frac{EF}{BE}=()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the rectangle ABCD, AB = N_0, BC = N_1, point E is on the diagonal AC, connects BE, and is made EF ⊥ BE, the foot of perpendicular is E, and the straight line EF intersects the line segment DC at the point F, then \\frac {EF}{BE} = ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,连接BF,取BF的中点O,连接OE,OC．∵四边形ABCD是矩形,EF⊥BE,∴∠BEF=∠BCF=90°,AB=CD=3,BC=AD=5,∵OB=OF,∴OE=OB=OF=OC,∴B,C,F,E四点共圆,∴∠EBF=∠ECF,∴tan∠EBF=tan∠ACD,∴\frac{EF}{EB}=\frac{AD}{CD}=\frac{5}{3},故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查矩形的性质,四点共圆的判定,圆周角定理等知识,解题的关键是学会添加辅助圆解决问题,属于中考选择题中的压轴题．
